tool_description: Retrieves the latest news from the fitness and health world, from a variety of sources.
name: Live Fitness and Health News
title: Live Fitness and Health News

api_list.name: Get Fitness and Health News from a specific source.
api_list.description: This endpoint provides all fitness and health news, from a specific source of your choice. The given sources are provided in the "About" section.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-fitness-and-health-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/Harvard Health Publishing"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-fitness-and-health-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://live-fitness-and-health-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-fitness-and-health-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Fitness and Health News
api_list.description: This endpoint provides all the recent fitness and health news articles available.
